summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.event: Firefly Aerospace becomes the first commercial company to successfully land
events.details: Firefly Aerospace becomes the first commercial company to successfully land on the Moon with no technical issues, with its Blue Ghost Mission 1

events.event: The Trump administration pauses military aid to Ukraine , following
events.details: The Trump administration pauses military aid to Ukraine , following the Oval Office meeting with Zelenskyy the previous week

events.event: Colossal Biosciences creates woolly mice as part of de-extinction efforts
events.details: Colossal Biosciences creates woolly mice as part of de-extinction efforts for the woolly mammoth

events.event: Sudan files an application against the United Arab Emirates before
events.details: Sudan files an application against the United Arab Emirates before the International Court of Justice , alleging violations of the Convention on the Prevention and Punishment of the Crime of Genocide by the UAE through its support for the RSF , which is responsible for the genocide in Darfur

events.event: 17 – The 2025 Special Olympics World Winter Games are
events.details: 17 – The 2025 Special Olympics World Winter Games are held in Turin , Italy

events.event: More than 1,000 people, including civilians, are reported killed in
events.details: More than 1,000 people, including civilians, are reported killed in a crackdown by Syrian transitional government security forces in the Alawite region, described as the country's worst violence for years

events.event: 2025 Greenlandic general election : The center-right Democrats become the
events.details: 2025 Greenlandic general election : The center-right Democrats become the largest party, defeating the incumbent Inuit Ataqatigiit

events.event: Balochistan Liberation Army militants blow up railway tracks and hijack
events.details: Balochistan Liberation Army militants blow up railway tracks and hijack the Jaffar Express train bound from Quetta to Peshawar , taking 450 people hostages including both security personnel and civilians

events.event: The former President of the Philippines , Rodrigo Duterte ,
events.details: The former President of the Philippines , Rodrigo Duterte , is arrested in the Philippines after being served an arrest warrant from the International Criminal Court for crimes against humanity

events.event: 2025 Belizean general election : The incumbent People's United Party
events.details: 2025 Belizean general election : The incumbent People's United Party wins a second term in a landslide victory

events.event: A fire breaks out in a nightclub in Kočani ,
events.details: A fire breaks out in a nightclub in Kočani , North Macedonia, killing at least 59 people and injuring 155 others

events.event: Keith Rowley resigns as Prime Minister of Trinidad and Tobago
events.details: Keith Rowley resigns as Prime Minister of Trinidad and Tobago after nine years in office, and is succeeded by Stuart Young

events.event: Israel launches widespread aerial bombardments and attacks on the Gaza
events.details: Israel launches widespread aerial bombardments and attacks on the Gaza Strip , killing at least 591 people, including children, ending the ceasefire agreement reached in January

events.event: The President of Somalia , Hassan Sheikh Mohamud , survives
events.details: The President of Somalia , Hassan Sheikh Mohamud , survives an attack on his convoy by al-Shabaab , killing at least 10 people

events.event: Nationwide protests erupt across Turkey following the arrest of the
events.details: Nationwide protests erupt across Turkey following the arrest of the mayor of Istanbul , Ekrem İmamoğlu , on charges of corruption and terrorism

events.event: Kirsty Coventry is elected as the 10th, first female and
events.details: Kirsty Coventry is elected as the 10th, first female and African President of the International Olympic Committee in the first round of voting in the 144th IOC Session

events.event: A major power outage causes Heathrow Airport in London to
events.details: A major power outage causes Heathrow Airport in London to completely shut down, with disruption expected to last for days, affecting thousands of flights around the world

events.event: South Korea experiences one of its worst wildfires in modern
events.details: South Korea experiences one of its worst wildfires in modern history; over 87 000 hectares of land are destroyed in South Gyeongsang Province , killing at least 28 people

events.event: A 7.7-magnitude earthquake occurs in Myanmar , resulting in 5,413
events.details: A 7.7-magnitude earthquake occurs in Myanmar , resulting in 5,413 killed and 11,402 injured

events.event: The Caribbean guilder is introduced, replacing the Netherlands Antillean guilder
events.details: The Caribbean guilder is introduced, replacing the Netherlands Antillean guilder as the currency for Curaçao and Sint Maarten
